page.title: 19TRANSPORT
page.content: Four days a week the milkman comes to sell dairy products as well deliver milk. The postman delivers the mail every day of the week except Sunday,and will deliver papers if you require them. If you wish books to read,the mobile library comes every second Wednesday If you keep a book too long you may have to pay a fine of 20p but that only applies to adults. Other visits are made by the fishmonger's van and the baker's van which are very useful to those people without transport or those who are unable to get out and about.
